alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 22 at 6:36PM CST until January 25 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Holmes and Attala Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River At West. * WHEN...From Monday evening to Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Lowlands and agricultural land near the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM CST Saturday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Monday evening to a crest of 15.0 feet Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Big Black River West 15.0 12.4 Sat 5 pm CST 13.0 15.0 13.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 900 AM CST.
